title: Pakistan's election commission bars Imran Khan from office
description: The Election Commission of Pakistan disqualifies the former prime minister, Imran Khan, from holding public office for unlawfully selling state gifts. Also: President Zelensky of Ukraine accuses Russia of planting mines at a dam near the city of Kherson. And how Italians feel about comparisons between the UK and Italy, when it comes to political instability.
itunes:subtitle: Imran Khan is accused of not declaring gifts from foreign dignitaries
itunes:summary: The Election Commission of Pakistan disqualifies the former prime minister, Imran Khan, from holding public office for unlawfully selling state gifts. Also: President Zelensky of Ukraine accuses Russia of planting mines at a dam near the city of Kherson. And how Italians feel about comparisons between the UK and Italy, when it comes to political instability.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
